post.author: 강윤정
post.content:
I loaded zip file of design pattern e-book on our FTP server.
1. after accessing our FTP server.. (Please refer how to access it written by Mr.Choi Ik Jun..) go to /okid subdirectory.
2. get the only zip file.
That book doesn't include java sample code, but it is really well described easily , worth of trying.
post.title: design pattern electronic book on comm1 FTP server.
